statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, age, address FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_email, registration_date FROM customer_data WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, quantity FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products
SELECT customer_name, date_joined FROM customers ORDER BY date_joined
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, quantity, subtotal FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, category_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE customer_id = 1;
